I am recovering well & encourage all Americans to receive a skin check by a dermatologist. It only takes a few mins but is critical in identifying skin cancer early. Health screenings during #COVID19 are down significantly. We must resume these crucial procedures.

(1/2) I went in for a routine check-up at the dermatologist and had a biopsy, which ultimately revealed melanoma. Unfortunately, the landscape that we all know & love in CO, with its high altitude & plentiful sunshine, accelerates the rate at which damage is caused by the sun.

(4/4) It has been an honor to serve as the Ranking Member of the Readiness Subcommittee. @RepGaramendi and I consistently worked in a bipartisan fashion to ensure our service members and their families had the training resources and equipment they needed.
(3/4) I look forward to continuing working with my @HASCRepublicans colleagues and am grateful to @RepMikeRogersAL for the opportunity to lead Republican efforts on this crucial subcommittee.

(2/4) With the #CCP developing new hypersonic missiles and Russia testing anti-satellite weapons, it is vital that our military has the resources and capabilities necessary to keep our county safe. We must be prepared for any attack, whether on land, water, air, or space.

(1/4) I am excited to announce that I will be the Ranking Member of the Strategic Forces subcommittee. This subcommittee consists of the oversight of nuclear weapons, missile defense, and space, all areas vital to our national security.
